collection_interval.description: CollectionInterval sets how frequently the scraper should be called and used as the context timeout to ensure that scrapers don't exceed the interval.

initial_delay.description: InitialDelay sets the initial start delay for the scraper, any non positive value is assumed to be immediately.

metadata_collection_interval.description: Collection interval for metadata. Metadata of the particular entity is collected when the entity changes. In addition metadata of all entities is collected periodically even if no changes happen. Setting the duration to 0 will disable periodic collection (however will not impact metadata collection on changes).

root_path.description: RootPath is the host's root directory (linux only).

timeout.description: Timeout is an optional value used to set scraper's context deadline.
